column1: Dumbledors were a legendary "ferocious race of winged insects"
column3: A Tolkien Bestiary mentioned only in Hobbits verse. The dumbledors were said to have battled a knight on a quest.

column1: Dumbledor or dumbledore is an obsolete English word for Wikipedia:Bumblebee.
:Dumbledors are described as being large winged insects weighing 6-8 pounds
column3: and to live in the Midgewater Marshes.
